SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM , M.PLANNER_NM , M.CNST_CHARG_NM , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT , M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT , M.RM , M.CTRT_NO , M.FCLTS_JOB_SE , M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ , M.MNTN_RPR_SE , M.MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE , GAM_GET_MNTN_RPR_SE_NM(M.MNTN_RPR_SE) MNTN_RPR_SE_NM , GAM_GET_MNTN_RPR_SE_NM(M.MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE) MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_PART , M.MNTN_RPR_CN , M.MNTN_RPR_BDGT , M.CNSTRTR , M.RESPON_ENGINEER , M.ENFORCE_YEAR , O.MNTN_RPR_CNST_MTH , O.UNIT , O.QY , O.PRICE , O.MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT OBJ_MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT , O.RM OBJ_RM , O.FCLTS_MNG_NO , G.PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM MNTN_RPR_DTLS_F M LEFT OUTER JOIN MNTN_RPR_OBJ_FCLTS_F O ON M.FCLTS_JOB_SE = O.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ = O.MNTN_RPR_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G ON O.FCLTS_MNG_NO = G.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1
AND G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
AND M.CNSTRTR LIKE '%' || #sCnstrtr# || '%'
AND ( M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT >= #sMntnRprCnstStartDtFr#
AND M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT <= #sMntnRprCnstStartDtTo#
)
ORDER BY M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM ASC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT , NVL(SUM(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT),0) AS SUM_MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT , NVL(SUM(M.MNTN_RPR_BDGT),0) AS SUM_MNTN_RPR_BDGT FROM MNTN_RPR_DTLS_F M LEFT OUTER JOIN MNTN_RPR_OBJ_FCLTS_F O ON M.FCLTS_JOB_SE = O.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ = O.MNTN_RPR_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G ON O.FCLTS_MNG_NO = G.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1
AND G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
AND M.CNSTRTR LIKE '%' || #sCnstrtr# || '%'
AND ( M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT >= #sMntnRprCnstStartDtFr#
AND M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT <= #sMntnRprCnstStartDtTo#
)

SELECT M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_NM , M.PLANNER_NM , M.CNST_CHARG_NM , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_START_DT , TO_CHAR(M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MNTN_RPR_CNST_END_DT , M.MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT , M.RM , M.CTRT_NO , (SELECT CTRT_NM FROM CTRT_INFO_F WHERE CTRT_NO = M.CTRT_NO) CTRT_NM , M.FCLTS_JOB_SE , GAM_GET_FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM(M.FCLTS_JOB_SE) FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM , M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GOUP_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ , M.MNTN_RPR_SE , M.MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE , GAM_GET_MNTN_RPR_SE_NM(M.MNTN_RPR_SE) MNTN_RPR_SE_NM , GAM_GET_MNTN_RPR_SE_NM(M.MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE) MNTN_SUB_RPR_SE_NM , M.MNTN_RPR_PART , M.MNTN_RPR_CN , NVL(M.MNTN_RPR_BDGT,'0') MNTN_RPR_BDGT , M.CNSTRTR , M.RESPON_ENGINEER , DECODE(M.ENFORCE_YEAR,NULL,'',M.ENFORCE_YEAR || '년') ENFORCE_YEAR , O.MNTN_RPR_CNST_MTH , O.UNIT , O.QY , O.PRICE , NVL(O.MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT,'0') OBJ_MNTN_RPR_CNST_AMT , O.RM OBJ_RM , O.FCLTS_MNG_NO , G.PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM MNTN_RPR_DTLS_F M LEFT OUTER JOIN MNTN_RPR_OBJ_FCLTS_F O ON M.FCLTS_JOB_SE = O.FCLTS_JOB_SE AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AND M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ = O.MNTN_RPR_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G ON O.FCLTS_MNG_NO = G.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE M.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND M.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND M.MNTN_RPR_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#mntnRprSeq#) AND O.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
